library(tidyverse)
library(nycflights13)

library(conflicted)
conflict_prefer("filter", "dplyr")
conflict_prefer("lag", "dplyr")


ggplot(
  data = mpg,
  mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)
) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_void()


ggplot(
  data = mpg,
  mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy)
) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()

ggplot(
  data = mpg,
  mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = class)
) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw()

ggplot(
  data = mpg,
  mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = class)
) +
  geom_point() +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")

ggplot(
  data = mpg,
  mapping = aes(x = displ, y = hwy, color = class)
) +
  geom_point() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom") +
  theme_bw()

ggplot(

) +
